alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cass and central Barnes Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 615 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Bald Hill Dam to Hunter. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Valley City, Casselton, Mapleton, Arthur, Hunter, Tower City and Page. This includes Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 275 and 340. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
